scripts.bootstrap: concurrently "cd migrate && yarn" "cd frontend && yarn" "cd backend && yarn"
scripts.dev: concurrently -k "cd frontend && yarn dev" "cd backend && yarn dev"
scripts.dev:legacy: concurrently -k "cd frontend && yarn dev:legacy" "cd backend && yarn dev"
scripts.postgres: docker run -e POSTGRES_USER=postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres -e POSTGRES_DB=crm -dp 5432:5432 --name crm-con postgres
